name: Dark Harvest Book Project (Demo)
description: Demo for the short visual novel version of Dark Harvest by Norman Partridge, or at least as short as it can get when it's made by two busy students trying to condense the important parts of a book plus two alternate endings into a "short" time. Writing by Riane, coding and sound design by Caden, with guest artist appearance by internet friend Hana, unrelated to this project. Updates soon to come with full endings: It's Tradition end, True End, and Rebel end.
